plot outline: Mahendran and Maya split up from a living together relationship, on the very day in which they completed 5 years. Though initially Mahendran feels it as refreshing, in a few days he realize that Maya is the integral part of his ego. memories of Maya invade his dreams and consciousness.. once he gets a call from Maya from Kedar, a Himalayan valley. _Oraalppokkam_ (qv) is the first online crowd funded movie in Malayalam. It has been completed with the contribution of more than 150 film lovers all over the world. The film was extensively shot in the flood affected areas of the Himalayan valleys of Uttarakhant
